text: Copenhagen 15/6 2017. 50 cl bottle from Meny. Kinda crazy looking Santa with a Rabid Reindeer on the label. Pours hazy opaque dark amber with yellowish head. Settles as 1,5 cm thick layer of fluffy foam. Moderate lacing. Aroma is sweet caramel, alcohol and a tart fruitiness reminding me of unripe berries. A little moldy. Soft carbonation and oily palate. Flavor has strong sweetness followed by distinct sour bitterness. Aftertaste is spicy, boozy and with good bitter twang. Not the usual style for a Christmas Beer. But a good shot.

Bottle 500ml. @ [ Scooper Tasting ], Ulfborg, Denmark. [ As Fanø Get Scrooged ].Clear medium to dark orange amber colour with a average, frothy, good lacing, mostly lasting, light light beige head. Aroma is moderate malty, caramel, sweet malt, moderate to heavy hoppy, citrus, orange, fruity hops. Flavor is moderate to heavy sweet and bitter with a long duration, fruity malt, orange, sweet malt, citrus, fruity hops. Body is medium, texture is oily, carbonation is soft. [20170304]
 7-3-7-3-15

Bottle @ Home. Pours very dark amber with a light tan head. Aroma of sweet malt, caramel, berries, fruity hops. Flavor is sweet, rather bitter, malt, caramel, berries, bitter citrus, grapefruitpeel. Medium body, average carbonation, sweet and bitter finish. 210417
Bottle @ fonefan tasting. Nice head with good duration. Color is amber. Aroma and taste are rich citrus, hops, flowers, malt, fruits and has a nice long bitter finish.
Bottle, 8%. Hazy dark amber with small tan head. Aroma is malt, fruit, hops, berries, soap and hop. Flavour is malt, caramel, toasted, sweet, berries, herbal, little soap, hop and medium bitter.
@Ulfborg Scooper. Hazy red amber, thick light beige head. Hoppy aroma, stone fruit and citrus. Light pine. Flavour has caramel, pine. Fruity sweetness and long piney bitter finish.

Bottle @ fonefan tasting. Hazy red with an off-white head. Aroma is sweet, malty, caramel, fruity and moderate hoppy - citrus. Flavor is quite sweet and rather bitter. Dry and rather bitter finish. 040317

Bottle 50 cl. Pours a cloudy, reddish brown with a creamy, yellowish head. Super spicy aroma from the Mosaic hops. Rich, malty body, again spicy in a spruce kinda way, massive crystal malts before a fairly hoppy finish. Interesting take on a Christmas beer. (An Irish Ale at 8% loaded with US hops? I think not. Lets call this an Imperial Red Ale, hence an American Strong Ale. 110117

UPDATED: NOV 20, 2016 Rotfruchtig und andersartig. Hoppy As Hell, deutlich heftiger als die angegebenen 54IBUs. Wild und hart intensiv. Interessante Spiceflavours in in Richtung Christmas zeigen. Vielleicht Ingwer? Irish Ale??? No way, vielmehr Outstanding RIPA. Malzograndoflair inklusive, aber trotzdem auch irgendwie schlank und ABSOLUT rund. 2x 0,1/1. Vom Fat beim WINTER BEER DAY 2016

Fruity and malty, with notes of caramel and toffee, light spice, grassy hoppy close.

Draught at Taphouse.
Hazy ruby colored with a small off-white head.
Fruity aroma of caramel, hops abd grass.
Fruity flavor of caramel, hops, grass and grapefruits.
Hoppy finish.
From tap at Taphouse. Hazy brownish colour with an off-white head. Aroma and flavour of hops, caramel, fruit, spice, butter and herbal notes.
From tap. Pours hazy brown with a small off white head. Aroma is spice, toasted and slight herbal. Caramelish. Butterish, spiced and malty. Bitter, spiced and dry finish.

Draft. A hazy red beer with a yellowish head. The aroma has notes of malt, caramel, spices, citrus fruits, and hops. The flavor is sweet with notes of malt, caramel, citrus fruit, alcohol, spices, and hops, leading to a bitter finish.
